alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Holt and northeastern Wheeler Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Chambers, or 20 miles south of O`Neill, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Knievels Corner, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Cumminsville and Four Corners. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 149 and 154, and between mile markers 157 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
